description: Full of crunch but with a welcome addition of creamy goats cheese.
name: Broccoli, Hazelnut & Goats Cheese Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the broccoli and place in a serving bowl with the hazelnuts and shallots from the oven. Sprinkle the goats cheese over the top and drizzle with oil before serving.
Drain the broccoli and place in a serving bowl with the hazelnuts and shallots from the oven. Sprinkle the goats cheese over the top and drizzle with oil before serving.
